title: qaziku
author: qaziku
created_time: September 14, 2022, 08:22:09 PMLast edit: September 15, 2022, 11:31:05 AM by qaziku
content: QZQ will act as a tokeniseddecentralised VR Crypto Citypowered by the Binance and EthereumNetwork.The QZQ coin Metaverse will be comprised of Real Estate QZQ that canbe Purchased & Governed by the QZQ token holders.The native token of Qaziku is $QZQ and holders will be known as Qaziku holders.The Metaverse is the bridge between physicaland virtual worlds within the decentralisedand open source virtual world. Cryptographicprotocols will emerge for managing digital value, for example, digital art, real estate &advertising space. The facilitators that make thishappen will be NFT’s on the BSC & ETH Networkallowing for affordable and rapid transactions.“ W h a t is theMetaverse?”“Qaziku will providean unprecedentedVR Experience for thecrypto c ommunity,bringing users togetherall in one immersive andengaging environment.““EDUCATE YOURSELF IN THEWORLD OF CRYPTO”The world of crypto can be an extremely difficult place to navigate your way around.With Youtube, Telegram, Twitter & other news platforms, Qaziqu will position itself asa central hub, where users can come and learn in an open and friendly environment.“GENERATE REVENUE THROUGHMULTIPLE INCOME STREAMS”Qaziku will be a land of earning opportunities for Qaziku ers. Following the IDO,Qaziku real estate will be made available for Qaziku ers to purchase. Otheropportunities will consist of passive earning, staking and advertising.“RELAX, SOCIALISE, HAVE FUNAND COMPETE”Users can come and play games, entertain friends and network through a trulyimmersive, first-person perspective of a virtual reality world.“PUSH THE BOUNDARIES OF YOURCREATIVITY”Create scenes, artworks, challenges and more, using the simple Builder tool, thentake part in events to win prizes. For more experienced creators, the SDK (softwaredevelopment kit) provides the tools to fill the world with social games and applications.Telegram -🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 https://t.me/qazikuWebsite - https://qaziku.ioA DECENTRALISED METAVERSE VR NetworkBy using the world’s most advanced real time 3D Creation Engine. www.QAZIKU.io

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: 1000x potential seems pretty scamish advertising to me.  Anytime someoneentions potential gains as part of theor sales pitch tells me it's shady.  Sorry but what is it that makes this coin have a potential of 1000x.  And based on what?  This seems more situated in altcoin announcements than altcoin discussion.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Would have been nice if you created a more interesting announcement without claiming anything about the value of your coin. This just returns a negative vibe from us users because it's as if there'll be something shady that will happen to its price and that you're focusing more on your profits rather than what the altcoin can actually offer. Move this to Altcoin Announcements and perhaps add some images that will outline your roadmap and your plans for the future of the coin. I'm not sold on this announcement.Quote from: qaziku on September 14, 2022, 08:22:09 PMAs soon as the world starts to know what QAZIKU  is, nothing can stop us. Join us, spread the word and enjoy your the ride 🚀🚀🚀THE 'UNRUGGABLE' VR PROJECT. The primary purpose of this coin is to assist young enthusiasts globally so they can realise and achieve their dreams helping to further mankind’s journey to the stars.Also, this looks vague, and not really outlining anything interesting. I can already reach the stars without having someone to assist me. A good hit on a good blunt can already fix that

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Quote from: wheelz1200 on September 14, 2022, 08:33:07 PM1000x potential seems pretty scamish advertising to me.  Anytime someoneentions potential gains as part of theor sales pitch tells me it's shady.  Sorry but what is it that makes this coin have a potential of 1000x.  And based on what?  This seems more situated in altcoin announcements than altcoin discussion.  And most likely it will not going to happen, Lol, 1000x? we are in a bearish trend, maybe someone will buy I we have our doubts that it can reach this price.And on the other hard, most of the time those who hype this kind of projects here in the community, investors became more hesitant and it could backfire on the project itself. So I would say to the OP that you might did more harm that good with your project with your absurd claims.

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: Quote from: dothebeats on September 14, 2022, 08:48:37 PMWould have been nice if you created a more interesting announcement without claiming anything about the value of your coin. This just returns a negative vibe from us users because it's as if there'll be something shady that will happen to its price and that you're focusing more on your profits rather than what the altcoin can actually offer. Move this to Altcoin Announcements and perhaps add some images that will outline your roadmap and your plans for the future of the coin. I'm not sold on this announcement.Quote from: qaziku on September 14, 2022, 08:22:09 PMAs soon as the world starts to know what QAZIKU  is, nothing can stop us. Join us, spread the word and enjoy your the ride 🚀🚀🚀THE 'UNRUGGABLE' VR PROJECT. The primary purpose of this coin is to assist young enthusiasts globally so they can realise and achieve their dreams helping to further mankind’s journey to the stars.Also, this looks vague, and not really outlining anything interesting. I can already reach the stars without having someone to assist me. A good hit on a good blunt can already fix that Lol, when I read about the primary purpose of this coin, and really make it more unique, seems though that they really take it one step ahead of the game,  . Not sure though, what stars are their goal,I guess this will be another pump and dump coin, this is how I'm seeing how this coin is going to be used by those groups and how it will get it's value. So it's possible to hit 1000x, it's just the question on how quick and fast it will go down to nothing.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Most obvious scam I have ever seen.
